attributes.action: Following the dismissal of Bryan Barkley, the Government to introduce legal protections for employees and volunteers believing in traditional marriage
attributes.additional_details: Following the dismissal of Bryan Barkley by the British Red Cross over his traditional views on marriage, we demand that the Government debate and introduce legal protections for volunteers and employees who hold traditional views on marriage, that they may not be dismissed or discriminated against because of this religious belief.

rejection.details:
There are already legal protections against this.  Mr Barkley should
contact the Equality Advisory Support Service for help and advice.
